text: Michael Bisping (born 28 February 1979) is a Britishhttps://www.independent.co.uk/sport/ufc/michael-bisping-everything-you- need-to-know-about-the-british-ufc-champion-a7066151.html retired mixed martial artist and current commentator and actor. He competed in the middleweight and light heavyweight division of the Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC). He was the UFC middleweight champion from 2016 to 2017. He had 39 professional fights, winning 30 and losing nine. Bisping was born on a British military base in Nicosia, Cyprus. He grew up in Clitheroe, Lancashire. His father was in the British Army and is of Polish ancestry. His mother is Irish. He has three children with his Australian wife Rebecca. ==References== ==Other websites== *UFC profile * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:British mixed martial artists Category:Sportspeople from Lancashire
title: Michael Bisping
